page.title: 02CADWIN FARM
page.content: We had a visit to Mr.Sandercock's farm and he said he grew grass and corn, mainly barley.He has sixty acres to grow crops and keep his animals.He has 20 cows and 20 calves.Two of the cows are Guernseys,two are Jerseys and the rest are Friesians.There were too many males so he had to sell them to the market.Mr.Sandercock goes to the { {Royal Cornwall Show}most years.Each day he gets up at 6-30a.m.He has 2 and a half tractors and one combine harvester.The half of a tractor is used for parts.We went into one of the fields and the friendliest cow,which is a Jersey,came up to us.We were able to stoke her.We went to a field to see this year's corn crop.We could see our school from the hill.It was a very nice afternoon.
